description: Create a tool to get transactional data from DataStax Astra DB CQL Table

inputs.name: tool_description
inputs.info: The tool description to be passed to the model.

inputs.name: keyspace
inputs.info: The keyspace name within Astra DB where the data is stored.

inputs.name: table_name
inputs.info: The name of the table within Astra DB where the data is stored.

inputs.name: token
inputs.info: Authentication token for accessing Astra DB.

inputs.name: api_endpoint
inputs.info: API endpoint URL for the Astra DB service.

inputs.name: projection_fields
inputs.info: Attributes to return separated by comma.

inputs.name: tools_params
inputs.info: Define the structure for the tool parameters. Describe the parameters in a way the LLM can understand how to use them. Add the parameters respecting the table schema (Partition Keys, Clustering Keys and Indexed Fields).

table_schema.name: name
table_schema.description: Name of the field/parameter to be used by the model.

table_schema.name: field_name
table_schema.description: Specify the column name to be filtered on the table. Leave empty if the attribute name is the same as the name of the field.

table_schema.name: description
table_schema.description: Describe the purpose of the parameter.

table_schema.name: mandatory
table_schema.description: Indicate if the field is mandatory.

table_schema.name: is_timestamp
table_schema.description: Indicate if the field is a timestamp.

table_schema.name: operator
table_schema.description: Set the operator for the field. https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra-db-serverless/api-reference/documents.html#operators

inputs.name: partition_keys
inputs.info: Field name and description to the model

inputs.name: clustering_keys
inputs.info: Field name and description to the model

inputs.name: static_filters
inputs.info: Field name and value. When filled, it will not be generated by the LLM.
